1.text: Shuffle the character cards and deal 2 to each player facedown.

3.text: Keep your cards hidden and your coins visible at all times.

4.text: Give a summary card to each player for reference.

5.text: Start with the player to the left of the dealer and perform 1 action.

6.text: Choose income to take 1 coin from the bank.

7.text: Pick foreign aid to take 2 coins from the treasury.

8.text: Pay 7 coins to choose coup and take a player’s influence card.

9.text: Play taxes and take 3 coins if you have the Duke.

10.text: Pay 3 coins to eliminate a card from another player if you have the Assassin.

11.text: Steal 2 coins from another player if you have the Captain.

12.text: Draw 2 cards and swap them with your own if you have the Ambassador.

13.text: Give other players the opportunity to block an action.

14.text: Block foreign aid if you have the Duke.

15.text: Stop an assassination if you have the Contessa.

16.text: Prevent stealing with the Ambassador or the Captain.

17.text: Challenge a player to prove that they have the required influence.

18.text: Flip a card face up if you lose influence.

19.text: Eliminate players by getting them to turn both of their cards face up.

20.text: Continue playing until there’s only 1 player remaining.
